content: No. The lesson then should not be to NOT be afraid. It’s inhuman to NOT be afraid. Fear is an emotion and it’s a part of life. It’s a barometer that keeps us in check as we walk the line of life and tells us of impending danger as we walk the line of life. I think the true lesson should be then that we need to learn to push through the fear. Because on the other side of that fear is where the victory is found.
